summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department, authorizing the sale and removal of certain timber in the E 1/2 NE 1/4 Section 9, Township 22 North, Range 8 East, W.M. and the S 1/2 SE 1/4 Section 19, Township 22 North, Range 10 East, WM., in the Cedar River Watershed under contract with the Mountain Tree Farm Company.
